import React from 'react'; import { makeStyles, withTheme } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ root: { backgroundColor: withTheme, '& .MuiTextField-root': { margin: theme.spacing(1), width: '25ch' } } })); export default function Form() { const classes = useStyles(); const [value, setValue] = React.useState('Controlled'); const handleChange = event => { setValue(event.target.value); }; return (
); }
